name: My Underwater Dragon
description:
Become a creature from the old mystic tales and ancient legends – a dragon! Here we merge two different dragon types for your pleasure, so you can fly in the air and swim deep in the ocean at the same time! Enjoy the life of this giant mysterious beast playing our new My Underwater Dragon – this is a real quest for some experienced players!

My Underwater Dragon features:
• Stunning life of the flying creature from the old legends
• Amazing survival, exploration, fighting and mating quests
• Opportunity to create your own dragon family
• Many dangerous predators to fight with
• Great variety of unlockable colorful skins and fantastic power-ups
• Chance to discover fascinating lowpoly locations made in 3D

The real life is boring, isn’t it? Check this amazing My Underwater Dragon game and dip into the lowpoly fantasy world being a real dragon!
